40 #include <rosparam_shortcuts/rosparam_shortcuts.h>
41 
42 #include <moveit_servo/make_shared_from_pool.h>
43 #include <moveit_servo/servo.h>
44 
45 static const std::string LOGNAME = "servo_node";
46 
47 namespace moveit_servo
48 {
49 namespace
50 {
51 constexpr double ROBOT_STATE_WAIT_TIME = 10.0; // seconds
52 } // namespace
53 
54 Servo::Servo(ros::NodeHandle& nh, const planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr& planning_scene_monitor)
55  : nh_(nh), planning_scene_monitor_(planning_scene_monitor)
56 {
57  // Read ROS parameters, typically from YAML file
58  if (!readParameters())
59  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
60 
61  // Async spinner is needed to receive messages to wait for the robot state to be complete
62  ros::AsyncSpinner spinner(1);
63  spinner.start();
64 
65  // Confirm the planning scene monitor is ready to be used
66  if (!planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor())
67  {
68  planning_scene_monitor_->startStateMonitor(parameters_.joint_topic);
69  }
70  planning_scene_monitor->getStateMonitor()->enableCopyDynamics(true);
71 
72  if (!planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor()->waitForCompleteState(parameters_.move_group_name,
73  ROBOT_STATE_WAIT_TIME))
74  {
75  ROS_FATAL_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Timeout waiting for current state");
76  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
77  }
78 
79  servo_calcs_ = std::make_unique<ServoCalcs>(nh_, parameters_, planning_scene_monitor_);
80 
81  collision_checker_ = std::make_unique<CollisionCheck>(nh_, parameters_, planning_scene_monitor_);
82 }
83 
84 // Read ROS parameters, typically from YAML file
85 bool Servo::readParameters()
86 {
87  std::size_t error = 0;
88 
89  // Optional parameter sub-namespace specified in the launch file. All other parameters will be read from this namespace.
90  std::string parameter_ns;
91  ros::param::get("~parameter_ns", parameter_ns);
92 
93  // If parameters have been loaded into sub-namespace within the node namespace, append the parameter namespace
94  // to load the parameters correctly.
95  ros::NodeHandle nh = parameter_ns.empty() ? nh_ : ros::NodeHandle(nh_, parameter_ns);
96 
97  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "publish_period", parameters_.publish_period);
98  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "collision_check_rate", parameters_.collision_check_rate);
99  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "num_outgoing_halt_msgs_to_publish",
100  parameters_.num_outgoing_halt_msgs_to_publish);
101  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "scale/linear", parameters_.linear_scale);
102  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "scale/rotational", parameters_.rotational_scale);
103  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "scale/joint", parameters_.joint_scale);
104  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "low_pass_filter_coeff", parameters_.low_pass_filter_coeff);
105  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "joint_topic", parameters_.joint_topic);
106  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "command_in_type", parameters_.command_in_type);
107  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "cartesian_command_in_topic", parameters_.cartesian_command_in_topic);
108  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "joint_command_in_topic", parameters_.joint_command_in_topic);
109  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "robot_link_command_frame", parameters_.robot_link_command_frame);
110  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "incoming_command_timeout", parameters_.incoming_command_timeout);
111  error +=
112  !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "lower_singularity_threshold", parameters_.lower_singularity_threshold);
113  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "hard_stop_singularity_threshold",
114  parameters_.hard_stop_singularity_threshold);
115  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "move_group_name", parameters_.move_group_name);
116  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "planning_frame", parameters_.planning_frame);
117  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "ee_frame_name", parameters_.ee_frame_name);
118  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "use_gazebo", parameters_.use_gazebo);
119  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "joint_limit_margin", parameters_.joint_limit_margin);
120  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "command_out_topic", parameters_.command_out_topic);
121  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "command_out_type", parameters_.command_out_type);
122  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "publish_joint_positions", parameters_.publish_joint_positions);
123  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "publish_joint_velocities", parameters_.publish_joint_velocities);
124  error +=
125  !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "publish_joint_accelerations", parameters_.publish_joint_accelerations);
126 
127  // Parameters for collision checking
128  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "check_collisions", parameters_.check_collisions);
129  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "collision_check_type", parameters_.collision_check_type);
130  bool have_self_collision_proximity_threshold = rosparam_shortcuts::get(
131  LOGNAME, nh, "self_collision_proximity_threshold", parameters_.self_collision_proximity_threshold);
132  bool have_scene_collision_proximity_threshold = rosparam_shortcuts::get(
133  LOGNAME, nh, "scene_collision_proximity_threshold", parameters_.scene_collision_proximity_threshold);
134 
135  double collision_proximity_threshold;
136  // 'collision_proximity_threshold' parameter was removed, replaced with separate self- and scene-collision proximity
137  // thresholds
138  // TODO(JStech): remove this deprecation warning in ROS Noetic; simplify error case handling
139  if (nh.hasParam("collision_proximity_threshold") &&
140  rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "collision_proximity_threshold", collision_proximity_threshold))
141  {
142  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "'collision_proximity_threshold' parameter is deprecated, and has been replaced by separate"
143  "'self_collision_proximity_threshold' and 'scene_collision_proximity_threshold' "
144  "parameters. Please update the servoing yaml file.");
145  if (!have_self_collision_proximity_threshold)
146  {
147  parameters_.self_collision_proximity_threshold = collision_proximity_threshold;
148  have_self_collision_proximity_threshold = true;
149  }
150  if (!have_scene_collision_proximity_threshold)
151  {
152  parameters_.scene_collision_proximity_threshold = collision_proximity_threshold;
153  have_scene_collision_proximity_threshold = true;
154  }
155  }
156  error += !have_self_collision_proximity_threshold;
157  error += !have_scene_collision_proximity_threshold;
158  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "collision_distance_safety_factor",
159  parameters_.collision_distance_safety_factor);
160  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "min_allowable_collision_distance",
161  parameters_.min_allowable_collision_distance);
162 
163  // This parameter name was changed recently.
164  // Try retrieving from the correct name. If it fails, then try the deprecated name.
165  // TODO(andyz): remove this deprecation warning in ROS Noetic
166  if (!rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "status_topic", parameters_.status_topic))
167  {
168  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "'status_topic' parameter is missing. Recently renamed from 'warning_topic'. Please update "
169  "the servoing yaml file.");
170  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "warning_topic", parameters_.status_topic);
171  }
172 
173  if (nh.hasParam("low_latency_mode"))
174  {
175  error += !rosparam_shortcuts::get(LOGNAME, nh, "low_latency_mode", parameters_.low_latency_mode);
176  }
177  else
178  {
179  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "'low_latency_mode' is a new parameter that runs servo calc immediately after receiving "
180  "input. Setting to the default value of false.");
181  parameters_.low_latency_mode = false;
182  }
183 
184  rosparam_shortcuts::shutdownIfError(LOGNAME, error);
185 
186  // Input checking
187  if (parameters_.publish_period <= 0.)
188  {
189  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'publish_period' should be "
190  "greater than zero. Check yaml file.");
191  return false;
192  }
193  if (parameters_.num_outgoing_halt_msgs_to_publish < 0)
194  {
195  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME,
196  "Parameter 'num_outgoing_halt_msgs_to_publish' should be greater than zero. Check yaml file.");
197  return false;
198  }
199  if (parameters_.hard_stop_singularity_threshold < parameters_.lower_singularity_threshold)
200  {
201  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'hard_stop_singularity_threshold' "
202  "should be greater than 'lower_singularity_threshold.' "
203  "Check yaml file.");
204  return false;
205  }
206  if ((parameters_.hard_stop_singularity_threshold < 0.) || (parameters_.lower_singularity_threshold < 0.))
207  {
208  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameters 'hard_stop_singularity_threshold' "
209  "and 'lower_singularity_threshold' should be "
210  "greater than zero. Check yaml file.");
211  return false;
212  }
213  if (parameters_.low_pass_filter_coeff < 0.)
214  {
215  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'low_pass_filter_coeff' should be "
216  "greater than zero. Check yaml file.");
217  return false;
218  }
219  if (parameters_.joint_limit_margin < 0.)
220  {
221  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'joint_limit_margin' should be "
222  "greater than or equal to zero. Check yaml file.");
223  return false;
224  }
225  if (parameters_.command_in_type != "unitless" && parameters_.command_in_type != "speed_units")
226  {
227  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "command_in_type should be 'unitless' or "
228  "'speed_units'. Check yaml file.");
229  return false;
230  }
231  if (parameters_.command_out_type != "trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory" &&
232  parameters_.command_out_type != "std_msgs/Float64MultiArray")
233  {
234  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter command_out_type should be "
235  "'trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory' or "
236  "'std_msgs/Float64MultiArray'. Check yaml file.");
237  return false;
238  }
239  if (!parameters_.publish_joint_positions && !parameters_.publish_joint_velocities &&
240  !parameters_.publish_joint_accelerations)
241  {
242  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "At least one of publish_joint_positions / "
243  "publish_joint_velocities / "
244  "publish_joint_accelerations must be true. Check "
245  "yaml file.");
246  return false;
247  }
248  if ((parameters_.command_out_type == "std_msgs/Float64MultiArray") && parameters_.publish_joint_positions &&
249  parameters_.publish_joint_velocities)
250  {
251  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "When publishing a std_msgs/Float64MultiArray, "
252  "you must select positions OR velocities.");
253  return false;
254  }
255  // Collision checking
256  if (parameters_.collision_check_type != "threshold_distance" && parameters_.collision_check_type != "stop_distance")
257  {
258  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "collision_check_type must be 'threshold_distance' or 'stop_distance'");
259  return false;
260  }
261  if (parameters_.self_collision_proximity_threshold < 0.)
262  {
263  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'self_collision_proximity_threshold' should be "
264  "greater than zero. Check yaml file.");
265  return false;
266  }
267  if (parameters_.scene_collision_proximity_threshold < 0.)
268  {
269  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'scene_collision_proximity_threshold' should be "
270  "greater than zero. Check yaml file.");
271  return false;
272  }
273  if (parameters_.scene_collision_proximity_threshold < parameters_.self_collision_proximity_threshold)
274  {
275  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'self_collision_proximity_threshold' should probably be less "
276  "than or equal to 'scene_collision_proximity_threshold'. Check yaml file.");
277  }
278  if (parameters_.collision_check_rate < 0)
279  {
280  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'collision_check_rate' should be "
281  "greater than zero. Check yaml file.");
282  return false;
283  }
284  if (parameters_.collision_distance_safety_factor < 1)
285  {
286  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'collision_distance_safety_factor' should be "
287  "greater than or equal to 1. Check yaml file.");
288  return false;
289  }
290  if (parameters_.min_allowable_collision_distance < 0)
291  {
292  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameter 'min_allowable_collision_distance' should be "
293  "greater than zero. Check yaml file.");
294  return false;
295  }
296 
297  return true;
298 }
299 
300 void Servo::start()
301 {
302  setPaused(false);
303 
304  // Crunch the numbers in this timer
305  servo_calcs_->start();
306 
307  // Check collisions in this timer
308  if (parameters_.check_collisions)
309  collision_checker_->start();
310 }
311 
312 Servo::~Servo()
313 {
314  setPaused(true);
315 }
316 
317 void Servo::setPaused(bool paused)
318 {
319  servo_calcs_->setPaused(paused);
320  collision_checker_->setPaused(paused);
321 }
322 
323 bool Servo::getCommandFrameTransform(Eigen::Isometry3d& transform)
324 {
325  return servo_calcs_->getCommandFrameTransform(transform);
326 }
327 
328 bool Servo::getCommandFrameTransform(geometry_msgs::TransformStamped& transform)
329 {
330  return servo_calcs_->getCommandFrameTransform(transform);
331 }
332 
333 bool Servo::getEEFrameTransform(Eigen::Isometry3d& transform)
334 {
335  return servo_calcs_->getEEFrameTransform(transform);
336 }
337 
338 bool Servo::getEEFrameTransform(geometry_msgs::TransformStamped& transform)
339 {
340  return servo_calcs_->getEEFrameTransform(transform);
341 }
342 
343 const ServoParameters& Servo::getParameters() const
344 {
345  return parameters_;
346 }
